subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The former Miami Dolphins running back Ricky Williams finished with 97 yards on 18 carries yesterday as the Toronto Argonauts defeated the Hamilton Tiger-Cats, 27-17, in the Canadian Football League opener for both teams.
snippet: The former Miami Dolphins running back Ricky Williams finished with 97 yards on 18 carries yesterday as the Toronto Argonauts defeated the Hamilton Tiger-Cats, 27-17, in the Canadian Football League opener for both teams.
